meta_title: Predictive Maintenance in Australia: Complete 2026 Guide
meta_description: The definitive guide to predictive maintenance for Australian industry. State regulations, mining & F&B applications, local challenges, and implementation strategies.
title: Predictive Maintenance in Australia: The Complete Guide for 2026

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Predictive Maintenance in Australia

image_prompt: A photo-realistic Australian mining operation showing a large haul truck or excavator in the background with the distinctive red earth of the Pilbara. In the foreground, two diverse maintenance workers (one man, one woman) wearing high-visibility orange vests, hard hats, and safety glasses examining equipment with a rugged tablet device (showing only the back). Blue sky with characteristic Australian eucalyptus trees visible at the edge of the operation. Industrial sensors visible on equipment. No text or logos.
target_audience: Australian maintenance managers, reliability engineers, plant managers in mining, food processing, and manufacturing
regulatory_frameworks: WA Mines Safety and Inspection Act 1994
QLD Mining and Quarrying Safety and Health Act 1999
NSW Work Health and Safety (Mines and Petroleum Sites) Act 2013
